name: River Rush (itch)
description:
Rush down a raging river and deliver as many boxes as you can with the help of the friendly duck! Be sure to check what boxes you're delivering, you wouldn't want to deliver the wrong ones...

Use WASD to steer your boat and push boxes into openings on the side of the river to rack up as many points as you can as you travel down the river in this endless puzzle game.

Features:

  • Endless gameplay
  • Increased difficulty as the game progress
  • Different types of boxes, each with different effects
  • Fun pixel art style
  • Talking advice duck

This game was developed as a part of the Miz Game Jam 1 and uses the 1-bit Pack by Kenney. All code and audio was made by nyuppo. This game should run on any hardware.

Full devlog video coming soon! Subscribe to my channel to see it when it comes out.
